data.name: fault - milestone two side: below
data.detailed_description:
From the visual novel series "fault," which has sold over 500,000 copies worldwide, comes the latest in the series after a six-year hiatus!

In the previous game, "fault milestone two", the main character Ritona was trapped in the underwater facility "Vita Domain" ,where she meets a mysterious girl named Paige who has a secret...
Will Ritona be able to escape the facility and reunite with the princess she is supposed to protect, Selphine, and her fellow Rune?

While keeping the emotionally-charged storyline, the adventure elements and visuals are renewed and enhanced from previous titles!
Enjoy the new world of "fault" as a cinematic adventure.

data.short_description: The cinematic adventure novel series "Fault" has sold over 500,000 copies worldwide, and the latest title in the series is now available after six years!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
